attributes.action: KEEP STAFFORDSHIRE BULL TERRIERS OUT OFF THE DANGEROUS DOGS ACT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
yet again the much loved staffy is under the firing line to be put on the dangerous dogs act register..
this is one of the most loving friendly dogs that anyone could ever own and like with all breeds it the way they are treated that makes a dog who it is and not just a breed. because its a staffy and not a cute little corgi [who have a nasty bite] why should this dog face a unhappy life of discrimination.
sign this to keep our much loved staffys from being classed as dangerous.
and invite mr brown to my home to see my staffy.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "keep Staffordshire Bull Terriers out off the Dangerous Dogs Act.”
The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19140


Prime Minister's Office
